title: Handle Expired Trial Follow-up
description: An automated email is sent to a user whose trial has expired, asking for feedback.

tasks.description: Identify a trial account that expired yesterday and had high engagement.
tasks.expected_outcome: System automatically identifies a suitable candidate for follow-up.

tasks.description: Send a templated follow-up email asking about their experience and if they have any questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a polite, automated follow-up email.
